bodyPatterns.equalToJson:
{"messages":[{"role":"user","content":"Generate a book concept for a Hero's journey fiction book (80-150 pages).
                The book should be written in US-English.

                Initial ideas: 2 sisters Isa and Caro, both mothers of a boy and a girl, have been separated by their and their husbands ' varying geographical assignments. One is a nurse in Strasbourg, the other is a stay at home mom in Seoul. Will they meet again?.

                Return a JSON object within a Markdown code block. Include:
                - "title": A compelling title.
                - "logline": A one-sentence summary.
                - "description": A description (around 180-220 words).

                ```json
                {
                    "title": "...",
                    "logline": "...",
                    "description": "..."
                }
                ```"}]}
